mapper.select:
select
from qizhe_scpc where 1 = 1
and ( qname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYW}),'%') or qgongsi LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYW}),'%') )
and DATE_FORMAT(dateMonth,'%Y-%m') = #{pd.dataMonth}
order by qgongsi desc

select
from qizhe_scpc
where DATE_FORMAT(dateMonth,'%Y-%m') = #{pd.dataMonth}
and ( qname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYW}),'%') or qgongsi LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYW}),'%') )
order by qgongsi desc
mapper.insert: insert into qizhe_img (scpcid, projectName, resource) values (#{id}, #{projectName}, #{image})
mapper.select: SELECT * from qizhe_img WHERE scpcid = #{id} and projectName = #{projectName}
mapper.insert: insert into qizhe_audit (scpcid, projectName, status, appeal, appealDate) values (#{scpcid}, #{projectName}, #{status}, #{appeal}, now())

insert into qizhe_audit2
scpcid, projectName, content1, status1, status2,
content1img,
#{scpcid}, #{projectName}, #{content1}, #{status1}, #{status2},
#{content1img}
mapper.select: select * from qizhe_audit2 where scpcid = #{scpcid} and projectName = #{projectName} limit 1
mapper.update:
update qizhe_audit2
status1 = #{status1},
content1 = #{content1},
content2 = #{content2},
content1img = #{content1img},
content2img = #{content2img},
audit1 = #{audit1},
audit2 = #{audit2},
WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE qizhe_audit set appealReply = #{appealReply}, status = #{status}, appealReplyDate = now() where id = #{id}
UPDATE qizhe_audit set lastReply = #{lastReply}, status = #{status}, lastReplyDate = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from qizhe_audit where scpcid = #{scpcid} and projectName = #{projectName}
select count(1) from qizhe_audit where scpcid = #{scpcid} and projectName = #{projectName}, and status not in (1, 3)
